item.description:
Please join us for our Annual Yule Celebration as we welcome back the light after the darkest, longest night of the year. Our evening will begin at 7PM with a ceremony marking the event, then proceed to festivities and merry-making. Also planned is a Yankee swap, pot-luck feast and Pagan Yule Carols.

If you wish to participate in the Yankee swap the only requirement is that your gift be hand made and home made. We will also be decorating a Yule log so feel free to bring anything you would like to add.

Admission is a non-perishable donation to the local food pantry, monetary donations to the church and contribution to the pot-luck supper are also appreciated.

Please RSVP at http://www.meetup.com...

Blessed be!


There will be no class this evening
item.name: Open Circle - Yule
